subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Running
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: After winning the Tour de France seven consecutive years, Lance Armstrong could be lolling around his home in Austin, Tex. But Armstrong is doing just the opposite.
snippet: After winning the Tour de France seven consecutive years, Lance Armstrong could be lolling around his home in Austin, Tex. But Armstrong is doing just the opposite.
